title: Early Payment Discount
terms: 1. A 2% discount will be applied if payment is received within 10 days.\n2. No discount is available after 10 days.\n3. Discount applies to invoice total excluding taxes.

title: Late Delivery Penalty
terms: 1. If delivery is delayed beyond agreed timeline, a penalty of 0.5% per day will be charged.\n2. Maximum penalty capped at 10% of total invoice.\n3. Force majeure events are exempt.

title: Shipping Responsibility
terms: 1. Seller is responsible for safe delivery until goods reach the buyer’s warehouse.\n2. Any damage during transit is the seller’s liability.\n3. Buyer must inspect goods within 48 hours of receipt.

title: International Sales Terms
terms: 1. All international orders are subject to Incoterms 2020.\n2. Customs duties and import taxes are buyer’s responsibility.\n3. Payment must be made in USD unless otherwise agreed.

title: Return Policy - 30 Days
terms: 1. Products can be returned within 30 days if unused and in original packaging.\n2. A restocking fee of 10% may apply.\n3. Refunds will be issued within 7 business days.

title: Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
terms: 1. Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of all shared information.\n2. Information may only be disclosed with written consent.\n3. Breach of NDA may lead to legal action.

title: Subcontractor Terms
terms: 1. Subcontractors must be pre-approved by the client.\n2. The company remains responsible for all deliverables.\n3. Confidentiality obligations extend to subcontractors.

title: Subscription Terms - SaaS
terms: 1. Subscription is billed monthly in advance.\n2. Non-payment within 15 days leads to account suspension.\n3. Cancellations must be made 7 days before renewal date.

title: Data Privacy Policy
terms: 1. All personal data will be processed in compliance with GDPR.\n2. Customer data will not be shared without consent.\n3. Data retention period is 5 years unless legally required.

title: Intellectual Property Rights
terms: 1. All deliverables remain the intellectual property of the company until full payment.\n2. Upon payment, client receives full usage rights.\n3. Company retains the right to reuse non-confidential components.

title: Force Majeure
terms: 1. Neither party will be liable for failure due to natural disasters, war, or strikes.\n2. Obligations will resume once conditions normalize.\n3. Contracts may be renegotiated in prolonged disruptions.

title: Termination Clause
terms: 1. Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days’ notice.\n2. Pending obligations must be fulfilled prior to termination.\n3. Breach of terms may lead to immediate termination.

title: Training Services Terms
terms: 1. Training fees must be paid in full before the session.\n2. Cancellations within 48 hours are non-refundable.\n3. Materials provided are for internal use only.

title: Consulting Services Agreement
terms: 1. Consulting services are billed hourly.\n2. Travel expenses are billed separately.\n3. Deliverables will be defined in the Statement of Work.

title: Annual Maintenance Contract
terms: 1. Includes preventive maintenance visits twice a year.\n2. Spare parts are billed separately.\n3. Contract renews annually unless canceled in writing.

title: Vendor Compliance Policy
terms: 1. All vendors must comply with company’s ethical standards.\n2. Non-compliance may result in termination of business.\n3. Vendor audits may be conducted periodically.

title: Employee Non-Compete Agreement
terms: 1. Employee agrees not to join competitors for 12 months after leaving.\n2. Applies only to direct competitors in the same market.\n3. Violation may result in legal consequences.

title: Work From Home Policy
terms: 1. Employees must be available during core working hours.\n2. Company equipment provided must be used only for work.\n3. Data security guidelines must be strictly followed.

title: Expense Reimbursement Policy
terms: 1. Claims must be submitted within 30 days of expense.\n2. Only business-related expenses will be reimbursed.\n3. Receipts are mandatory for all claims.

title: Probation Period Terms
terms: 1. Employees will undergo a probation period of 6 months.\n2. During probation, either party can terminate with 7 days’ notice.\n3. Benefits eligibility begins post-confirmation.

title: Standard Payment Terms - 30 Days
terms: 1. Payment is due within 30 days of the invoice date.\n2. A finance charge of 1.5% per month will be applied to overdue balances.

title: Strict Payment Terms - 15 Days
terms: 1. Payment is due within 15 days of the invoice date.\n2. Payments must be made via bank transfer.

title: 50% Advance, 50% on Delivery
terms: 1. 50% of the invoice value must be paid in advance.\n2. Remaining 50% due on delivery.

title: PO Required for All Orders
terms: 1. A valid Purchase Order is required before processing.\n2. Orders without PO will not be fulfilled.

title: Early Payment Discount
terms: 1. A 2% discount will apply if paid within 10 days.\n2. Discount not available after 10 days.

title: Late Delivery Penalty
terms: 1. If delivery is delayed, penalty of 0.5% per day applies.\n2. Maximum penalty capped at 10%.

title: Vendor Compliance Policy
terms: 1. Vendors must comply with company standards.\n2. Non-compliance may lead to termination.

title: Supplier Performance Evaluation
terms: 1. Supplier performance will be reviewed quarterly.\n2. Low performance may affect future orders.

title: Bulk Order Discounts
terms: 1. Discounts apply for orders exceeding thresholds.\n2. Discounts are pre-approved in writing.

title: Delivery Terms - FOB
terms: 1. Risk transfers once goods are loaded onto vessel.\n2. Buyer responsible for shipping costs.

title: Delivery Terms - CIF
terms: 1. Seller covers cost, insurance, and freight.\n2. Risk transfers upon arrival at port.

title: Goods Inspection Policy
terms: 1. Buyer must inspect goods within 48 hours.\n2. Any claims must be raised in writing.

title: Defective Material Returns
terms: 1. Defective materials may be returned within 14 days.\n2. Replacement or refund will be provided.

title: Minimum Order Quantity
terms: 1. Orders below MOQ will not be accepted.\n2. Exceptions require approval.

title: Price Revision Clause
terms: 1. Prices may be revised annually based on inflation.\n2. Prior notice of 30 days will be given.

title: Advance Security Deposit
terms: 1. Some orders require advance deposits.\n2. Deposit will be adjusted against final invoice.

title: Custom Duties & Taxes
terms: 1. Buyer responsible for duties and taxes.\n2. Seller will assist with documentation.

title: Cancellation of Orders
terms: 1. Orders cancelled within 48 hours incur no penalty.\n2. After dispatch, cancellation not allowed.

title: Supplier Confidentiality
terms: 1. Suppliers must keep all trade terms confidential.\n2. Breach may result in legal action.

title: Import Licenses & Permits
terms: 1. Buyer responsible for import permits.\n2. Seller will provide necessary documents.

title: Product Substitution Policy
terms: 1. Seller may substitute equivalent products.\n2. Substitutions must be approved.

title: Annual Rate Contracts
terms: 1. Prices locked for annual contracts.\n2. Review after one year.

title: Packaging Standards
terms: 1. Goods must meet company packaging guidelines.\n2. Improper packaging may result in rejection.

title: Payment in Foreign Currency
terms: 1. Payments for exports must be in USD.\n2. Exchange rate based on invoice date.

title: Vendor Audit Rights
terms: 1. Buyer may audit vendor facilities.\n2. Non-compliance may result in termination.

title: Retail Sale - No Returns
terms: 1. All retail sales are final.\n2. Returns only for defective products.

title: Return Policy - 30 Days
terms: 1. Products can be returned within 30 days.\n2. A restocking fee may apply.

title: Standard Warranty - 1 Year
terms: 1. Covers manufacturing defects only.\n2. Misuse or mishandling voids warranty.

title: Extended Warranty - 3 Years
terms: 1. Covers defects for 3 years from purchase.\n2. Additional cost applies.

title: Custom Project Terms
terms: 1. IP remains with company until full payment.\n2. Revisions limited to 3 rounds.

title: Software License Agreement
terms: 1. Software licensed, not sold.\n2. Reverse engineering prohibited.

title: Subscription Terms - SaaS
terms: 1. Billed monthly in advance.\n2. Non-payment may suspend services.

title: Confidentiality Agreement
terms: 1. All terms are confidential.\n2. Breach may lead to legal action.

title: International Sales Terms
terms: 1. Governed by Incoterms 2020.\n2. Buyer responsible for customs.

title: Customer Support Policy
terms: 1. Standard support hours 9–6 Mon–Fri.\n2. Tickets responded within 24 hours.

title: Project Delivery Timelines
terms: 1. Timelines agreed in Statement of Work.\n2. Delays communicated in advance.

title: Annual Maintenance Contract
terms: 1. Preventive maintenance twice yearly.\n2. Spare parts billed separately.

title: Service Level Agreement (SLA)
terms: 1. Critical issues resolved in 4 hours.\n2. Non-critical within 48 hours.

title: Maintenance Service Agreement
terms: 1. Auto-renews unless cancelled 30 days prior.\n2. Includes limited on-site visits.

title: Consulting Services Agreement
terms: 1. Consulting billed hourly.\n2. Travel expenses billed separately.

title: Training Services Terms
terms: 1. Training fees prepaid.\n2. Materials for internal use only.

title: Implementation Services
terms: 1. Scope defined in project plan.\n2. Changes billed separately.

title: Freelancer Agreement
terms: 1. Payment upon milestone approval.\n2. Contractor responsible for taxes.

title: Employee Expense Policy
terms: 1. Expenses must comply with policy.\n2. Receipts required for reimbursement.

title: Leave Policy
terms: 1. Leaves must be applied 7 days in advance.\n2. Unused leaves cannot be carried forward.

title: Probation Period Terms
terms: 1. Probation lasts 6 months.\n2. Termination during probation requires 7 days’ notice.

title: Work From Home Policy
terms: 1. Employees must log working hours.\n2. Company equipment used only for work.

title: Overtime Policy
terms: 1. Overtime requires prior approval.\n2. Paid at 1.5x hourly rate.

title: Employee Non-Compete Agreement
terms: 1. Employee may not join competitors for 12 months post-employment.\n2. Applies to direct market competitors only.

title: Non-Disclosure Policy
terms: 1. Employees must not disclose trade secrets.\n2. Breach may result in termination.

title: Employee Code of Conduct
terms: 1. Employees must maintain professionalism.\n2. Misconduct may lead to disciplinary action.

title: Equal Opportunity Policy
terms: 1. Company provides equal employment opportunity.\n2. Discrimination is not tolerated.

title: Health & Safety Policy
terms: 1. Employees must follow workplace safety rules.\n2. Non-compliance may result in penalties.

title: Anti-Harassment Policy
terms: 1. Harassment is strictly prohibited.\n2. Complaints will be investigated fairly.

title: Grievance Redressal Policy
terms: 1. Employees may report grievances confidentially.\n2. HR must address within 14 days.

title: Remote Work Equipment Policy
terms: 1. Employees responsible for care of company devices.\n2. Lost equipment must be reported immediately.

title: Intellectual Property Rights
terms: 1. IP remains with company unless otherwise stated.\n2. Client receives usage rights upon payment.

title: Force Majeure
terms: 1. Parties not liable for natural disasters or strikes.\n2. Obligations resume post-event.

title: Termination Clause
terms: 1. Either party may terminate with 30 days’ notice.\n2. All obligations due must be settled.

title: Data Privacy Policy
terms: 1. Customer data will be protected as per GDPR.\n2. Retention limited to 5 years unless legally required.

title: Dispute Resolution Clause
terms: 1. Disputes settled via arbitration.\n2. Venue decided mutually.

title: Governing Law
terms: 1. Agreement governed by Indian law.\n2. Jurisdiction: Coimbatore courts.
